Name: Worn Longsword
Description: This longsword has certainly seen better days. You should replace it as soon as you can.

Name: Worn Round Shield
Description: This round shield has certainly seen better days. You should replace it as soon as you can.

Name: Flint Logging Axe
Description: 1-Handed. A makeshift but functional Logging Axe. Used to gather trees, albeit slowly.

Name: Clothier's Shoes
Description: These fine shoes do more than get you from one place to another, they also make you look good.

Name: Clothier's Leggings
Description: They exude quality in the cut of their cloth and the cut of their pattern.

Name: Clothier's Shirt
Description: They say a well-dressed person has their own kind of armor.

Name: Clothier's Hat
Description: This hat tells other what good taste you have in headware.

Name: Clothier's Gloves
Description: Stylish and yet so very practical.

Name: Costumier's Shoes
Description: These are the envy of all who do not yet have a pair.

Name: Costumier's Leggings
Description: You are not impeccably dressed until you are wearing a pair of these leggings.

Name: Costumier's Shirt
Description: Nothing says good taste like an expertly made shirt.

Name: Costumier's Hat
Description: Now that is a hat which is sure to turn heads!

Name: Costumier's Gloves
Description: Only the wealthiest have gloves as cleverly made as these.

Name: Provender's Shoes
Description: The sauces spilled on these shoes have given them a rare sheen, much like a good shoe polish.

Name: Provender's Leggings
Description: The mixture of seasonings that were spilled on these make a delightful perfume.

Name: Provender's Shirt
Description: The scent of spices is so strong that many become hungry just standing next to you.

Name: Provender's Hat
Description: Six different herbs and spices have seasoned this hat to perfection.

Name: Provender's Gloves
Description: So heavily dusted with pepper are these, it's hard not to sneeze while wearing them.

Name: Grocer's Shoes
Description: You're not sure what was spilled on this, but it smells delicious.

Name: Grocer's Leggings
Description: Comfortable and practical for standing and cooking.

Name: Grocer's Shirt
Description: Perfect for working all day around food.

Name: Grocer's Hat
Description: A marvelous way to keep your hair away from any food.

Name: Grocer's Gloves
Description: They give off a fresh and fruity scent.

Name: Hide Headgear
Description: Let none deny your beautiful hair... or lack thereof.

Description: A sage's clothing made of silk. Do not be fooled by the threadbare look: sages pride themselves on looking unassuming. This clothing provides excellent elemental protection.

Name: Infused Silk Sage Gloves
Description: A sage's clothing made of Azoth-infused silk, offering the pinnacle of both comfort and elemental protection.

Name: Silk Officer Gloves
Description: The silk apparel of a military officer. This clothing offers a surprising amount of physical protection despite its light weight.

Name: Infused Silk Officer Gloves
Description: Officer's apparel crafted with Azoth-infused silk. Quite protective for its light weight.

Name: Infused Silk Courtier Gloves
Description: Is there a better way to express your social superiority than by wearing silk infused with the most powerful substance in the known world? What it lacks in protection it makes up for in reminding others that you are better than them.

Name: Havelock's Neglect
Description: "He and his work lived on. His mind, however..."

Name: Messenger of the Damned
Description: "It was a simple message. They were coming, and they were very well prepared."

Name: Wicked Muzzle
Description: "You have a feeling the bite may be worse than the bark in this case."

Name: Nature's Recourse
Description: "There is a deep sense of comfort hidden within the forest, and an even deeper sense of sorrow."

Name: Dauntless Cry
Description: "Dive in, headlong. Let the enemy know you approach. It's fairer that way."

Name: Fanged Mask
Description: A trimmed, plate mask.

Name: Dreadscythe Scar
Description: "It was a small price to pay, given the alternative."

Name: Hierophant's Ascension
Description: "The sky would open and welcome them, breathing an ancient power into their soul. You would join them."

Name: Freebooter's Bounty
Description: "Aye, to another ripe pillage! Hand me that drink there, will ye? No, no, not that one... that one's yours, lad."

Name: Carved Mask
Description: A carved wooden mask.

Name: Carved Mask
Description: A carved wooden mask.

Name: Protector's Vindication
Description: "Eventually they would be the one that is saved. Unfortunately, that would come long past their time."

Name: Burden of Despair
Description: "Not for what is or has been, but for what is to come."

Name: Malevolent Defender
Description: "While nature is quite adept at reclaiming things lost to time, it is more efficient to not lose them in the first place."

Name: Mark of Suppression
Description: "Less of a warning for the wearer as it is for those who have the misfortune of seeing it."

Name: Carved Mask
Description: A carved wooden mask.

Name: Carved Mask
Description: A carved wooden mask.

Name: Cael's Veil
Description: "In each lie there may be truths, and in each truth there may be lies. The difference stops mattering after so long lived."

Name: Mask by Karbetha
Description: The artist who painted this mask is quite popular on this forsaken island.

Name: Mask of the Demon
Description: "Buried in the darkest souls, heart both burning and chilling cold, waits the demon with cunning bold."

Name: Debug No Stability Tower Shield of Testing
Description: When wielded with the frailest of arms, no hits shall be absorbed.

Name: Debug No Crits Okayish Sword of Testing
Description: Noodly arms grasped around this sword will be unable to strike with strength or precision.

Name: Debug No Crits Rapier of Testing
Description: The wielder's arms, which are more wobbly than this blade, will be unable to strike with strength or precision.

Name: Debug No Crits Hatchet of Testing
Description: Frail arms combined with the mighty heft of this singled handed throwable weapon will be unable to strike with strength or precision.

Name: Debug No Crits Greatsword of Testing
Description: No real life accurate to reality human person would be able to wield this mighty weapon with strength or precision.

Name: Debug No Crits War Hammer of Testing
Description: Might as well grab a much smaller hammer if you want to strike with strength or precision.

Name: Debug No Crits Great Axe of Testing
Description: Might as well grab a much smaller axe if you want to strike with strength or precision.

Name: Debug No Crits Spear of Testing
Description: The mighty heft and girth of this sword rivals only that of the wielder's arms which is why they will be unable to strike with strength or precision.

Name: Debug No Crits Bow of Testing
Description: Yoinking back on the bow string of tautness is a mighty feat that prevents strikes with strength and precision.

Name: Debug No Crits Musket of Testing
Description: The recoil of this mighty fire arm is too strong to be able to strike with strength or precision.

Name: Debug No Crits Blunderbuss of Testing
Description: This bluderbuss loaded with bricks is too heavy to strike with strength or precision.

Name: Debug No Crits Fire Staff of Testing
Description: This totally innaccurate to real life history weapon makes it impossible to strike with strength or precision.

Name: Debug No Crits Life Staff of Testing
Description: This totally innaccurate to real life history weapon makes it impossible to strike with strength or precision.

Description: This totally innaccurate to real life history weapon makes it impossible to strike with strength or precision.

Description: This totally innaccurate to real life history weapon makes it impossible to strike with strength or precision.

Name: General Backstory
Description: The backstory that you've been provided is idealized for its level range, with gear score at or near the equippable level. Testers are encouraged to mix and match their gear and even omit filling some gem slots to have an experience more closely representative of the average player's.

Name: Maxed Backstory
Description: The backstory that you've been provided is idealized and the highest attainable gear score for its level range, with full gem slots and relevant attributes. It is most useful for content where we expect players to be highly optimized, in the eldergame, or when we just want a uniform experience.

Name: Expedition Backstory
Description: The backstory that you've been provided is meant to be representative of player power through natural play at its level range. Gem slots and attribute perks may be limited, and gear score slightly lower than what the player is able to equip.

Name: Irony
Description: "Only a true fool hides from inevitability."

Name: Governess
Description: "She did everything to protect her people. Sometimes it was from behind a desk. This time, it was at the battle lines."

Name: Knight Errant
Description: "I'm just passing through, but I have time to help."
